title: Django Student Management System
description: A Django-based Student Management System that enables seamless CRUD operations, allowing administrators to create, retrieve, update, and delete student records efficiently. It features a user-friendly interface and robust backend for managing student data.

title: Django CRM
description: A Client Management System that seamlessly integrates CRUD functionality for managing client data with ease and efficiency. It provides robust features for creating, reading, updating, and deleting client information, ensuring streamlined operations.

title: Puddle (Ecommerce Website)
description: A platform to post new items to sell in the marketplace and an in-built messaging system for communication

title: WriteSphere
description: A platform to create blogs and share it across the world

title: OGZ Website
description: A DApp for swapping OGZ Token

title: SpaceX Clone
description: A simple spaceX clone built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS

title: NBA Clone
description: A simple spaceX clone built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to show stats related to an NBA team

title: Multisender Aptos
description: A decentralized application to send NFT and coins to accounts on solana blockchain

title: Curativity
description: A platform to create campaigns and hire marketing talents
